Instrument.name: The OSIRIS-REx Visible and Near InfraRed Spectrometer (OVIRS) aboard the OSIRIS-REx spacecraft
Instrument.description: The OSIRIS-REx Visible and Near Infrared Spectrometer (OVIRS) is a point spectrometer with linear variable (wedge) filter. The instrument has a 4 mrad field of view and spectral coverage of 0.4 to 4.3 microns, and is used to map the surface characteristics of the target in visible and near-infrared wavelengths.
